help-file.title: BANISH
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
The zealot will attempt to banish any charmed pets present by dissolving the energies that bind the summoned slave to this plane of existence. If the creature fails its saving throw and is of elemental origin it will be sent back to its plane of existence, while undead slaves are destroyed. Purely magical creations will simply cease to be.
